title: The nail & the wheel the nail fastned by a hand from heaven, the wheel turned by a voyce from the throne of glory / both described in two severall sermons in the Green-yard at Norwich by John Carter, pastor of Great St. Peters.
author: Carter, John, d. 1655.
publisher: Printed by J. Macock for M. Spark, and are to be sold by William Franklin ...,
notes: "The nail hit on the head, and driven into the city and cathedral wall of Norwich" and "The wheel turned by a voice from the throne of glory" each have special t.p. and continuous paging.
Illustrated frontispiece for "The vvheel turned by a voice" on p. 52.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
